alert.note: Alert for Bracken; Campbell; Pendleton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 27 at 3:48AM EST until March 01 at 2:46PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Ohio River at Meldahl Dam. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ohio River at Meldahl Dam. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 49.0 feet, Lowland flooding near the river occurs, as well as backwater flooding in southern Clermont and Brown Counties in Ohio and Bracken County in Kentucky. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EST Sunday the stage was 46.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 49.2 feet Monday evening. - Action stage is 49.0 feet. - Flood stage is 51.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
